mapper.select:
select CAST(seq AS char(10)) as seq ,content ,CAST(date_format(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS char(100)) as reg_date ,reg_user ,title from board WHERE 1=1
AND seq = #{seq}
AND title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND date_format(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{sdate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{edate},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (content, del_date, del_yn, mod_date, reg_date, reg_user, title) VALUES(#{content}, NULL, 'N', NULL, #{reg_date}, #{reg_user}, #{title})
mapper.select: select cast(withme_no as char(10)) as withme_no, file_name, cast(date_format(incruit_edate,'%Y-%m-%d') as char(100)) as incruit_edate, incruit_no, incruit_ssts, user_name, withme_content, withme_hit, withme_title from withme where incruit_no = #{seq}
select cd_no ,cd_item ,cd_item_nm ,cd_group from cmm_code where 1=1 and cd_group = #{cd_group}
select mail_no ,reciever ,sender ,content ,read_yn ,send_date ,title from mail where reciever = #{reciever}
